page.title: 11CHIRNSIDE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: We have a computer, calculators and electronics kits, and soon we hope to have an electronic keyboard in the Primary department. The Special Unit has a computer and an electronic keyboard. Other people who work in the school are a secretary, an auxiliary, a janitor, 2 cleaners,and 3 canteen ladies. The auxiliary takes dinner duty, tapes radio programmes and helps children and teachers. The janitor and cleaners keep the school very tidy. The canteen ladies provide main-course meals for 55 to 65 children. About the same number bring packed lunches. School meals cost 47p. We take part in several sports _ football, hockey, netball, basketball, badminton and athletics. Gymnastics and Brownies are held after school.
